titleStmt.title: The cloak in its colours; or The Presbyterian unmasked, and proved as dangerous as papists to the Church of England Together with a brief and seasonable ansvver to their late unseasonable queries, and list of the pensioners, humbly offer'd to all true Protestant conformists.

notesStmt.note: The second part is a reply to: Sober and seasonable queries humbly offered to all good Protestants in England in order to a choice of the new Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
